name: Planet Wars Lite
description:
Planet Wars - Battle for supremacy

Dominate planets by invading them!
Send your battle fleets to compete with a vicious AI in a war for ultimate control.

Featuring:
- Smooth Gameplay.
- 3 Different Levels.
- Amazing Graphics and Sounds.
- Compete against super intelligent AI.

Are you able to colonize all the planets? Prove it!
If you love strategic games, you gonna love it!

Instructions:

Hold your finger on your (red) planet to select it then click on the planet you want to send your spaceship fleet.
